title: Adding Pentakill music at the start of the game with the Pentakill skins?
body:
Out of all the skins and champions that have start up/in game music, Pentakill doesn't have this awesome feature surprisingly. For a music themed skin that's quite popular, it hasn't got this treatment yet. 

For the original members, they can swap between a short rendition of Mortal Reminder or Lightbringer, and for Kayle, maybe a short rendition of Tears of the Goddess or Frozen Heart. 

Eh Riot? For the next album?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
